channel.title: BMS does not save the "view roll" setting
channel.description:
View Roll is always reverts to 3.5 on startup.
Does anyone know the cvar for it so I can set it to 0 in the autoexec config?

item.title: BMS does not save the "view roll" setting
item.dc:creator: lwf
item.description:
It’s “rollangle” but simply putting it in your autoexec does not work. I found a workaround, this will turn it off permanently.

bind “a” “+moveleft;rollangle 0”
bind “d” “+moveright;rollangle 0”
